sql.query:
SELECT salt AS saltvalue, user_tpin, id, md_id, ds_id
FROM m_users
WHERE user_type BETWEEN 1 AND 3 AND u_status = '1' AND blank2 = :P1 /* {{$_POST.username}} */

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countmdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.md_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT COUNT(id) AS countdt
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{getSalt.ds_id.toNumber()}} */ AND u_status = '1'

SELECT COUNT(id) AS CountId
FROM aeps_beneficiary_cashfree
WHERE parent_id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */

SELECT aeps_merchant_id, user_fname, user_mobile
FROM m_users
WHERE id = :P1 /* {{identity}} */

INSERT INTO aeps_beneficiary_cashfree
(benef_id, benef_name, benef_mobile, benef_email, bank_ac, ifsc, address1, pincode, ip, status, remarks, created_by, created_on, parent_id, state) VALUES (:P1 /* {{TrId}} */, :P2 /* {{$_POST.UserName}} */, :P3 /* {{GetMobile.user_mobile}} */, :P4 /* {{'swinfotech2021@gmail.com'}} */, :P5 /* {{$_POST.BankAC}} */, :P6 /* {{$_POST.BankIFSC}} */, :P7 /* {{$_POST.Address}} */, :P8 /* {{$_POST.AreaPIN}} */, :P9 /* {{$_SERVER.REMOTE_ADDR}} */, :P10 /* {{1}} */, :P11 /* {{$_POST.BankName}} */, :P12 /* {{identity}} */, :P13 /* {{NOW}} */, :P14 /* {{identity}} */, :P15 /* {{0}} */)
